name: The Way Home (itch) (viviennelin, crochop, Takinn, helloquat)
name_original: The Way Home (itch) (viviennelin, crochop, Takinn, helloquat)
description:
(BEST PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN)

Navigate your ship across the galaxy and find your way home! Don't let your ship run out of waypoints or resources, and of course, try not to crash into anything dangerous...

Controls:

WASD - Movement 

Q - Place waypoint 

F - Destroy waypoint 

E - Give resources to spaceship / destroy obstacle / mine resource / pick up coin (requires contact)

----------------------------------------------------

Created for College Game Jam 2021
